    Constructor
    Description
    MainController()
    Constructs new MainController and initialises necessary components, such as userHolder, presetHolder,presetDAO, and userDAO, and retrieves user and presets from database

    Handles the onConfirmParentalControlsButtonClick action by checking if the password entered in correct.
    void
    onDeleteButtonClick()
    Handles the onDeleteButtonClick action by deleting the selected preset from the database, and removing it from the ComboBox
    void
    onEditPasswordButtonClick()
    Handles the onEditPasswordButtonClick action by checking if the password field is editable, if so it checks the password is not blank, then it displays the password authentication pane If the password field is not editable, the password field is cleared, and then set to editable, and the button text is changed to "SAVE"
    void
    onEditUserNameButtonClick()
    Handles the onEditUserNameButtonClick action by checking if the username field is editable, if so it checks the username is not already taken, if the password is taken, it displays an error message and changes the button text to "EDIT" If the username field is not editable, then the text is changed to "SAVE" and the field is set to editable
    void

    Handles the onLogOutButton action by setting the visibility of the blackout and confirmation panes, through the use of the showPane function

      Initialise the controller automatically after the FXML file is loaded
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Used to resolve paths for objects. Returns null if path is unknown
      resourceBundle - Used to localise an object. Returns null if it can not localise.

    • setSlider

      public void setSlider(javafx.scene.control.Slider TimerSlider, javafx.scene.control.Label SliderLabel, focusApp.controllers.MainController.TimeID TID)
      Sets the slider colour to reflect the selected time
      Parameters:
      TimerSlider - Used for selecting the time
      SliderLabel - Used to display the selected time
      TID - Used to distinguish between start and end time

    • loadPresets

      public void loadPresets()
      Loads the preset and ComboBox based off of the current user If no presets exist, a default preset is created called "Preset"

    • onPresetsButtonClick

      public void onPresetsButtonClick() throws IOException, org.apache.commons.imaging.ImageReadException
      Handles the action for when a preset is selected from the ComboBox
      Throws:
      IOException - If an exception occurred while loading the FXML file
      org.apache.commons.imaging.ImageReadException - If an exception occurred while reading an image

    • onDeleteButtonClick

      public void onDeleteButtonClick()
      Handles the onDeleteButtonClick action by deleting the selected preset from the database, and removing it from the ComboBox

    • saveEditedPresetName

      public boolean saveEditedPresetName()
      Saves an edited preset to the database and updates the combo box
      Returns:
      True if the preset name was successfully changed, false if not

    • updateBlockList

      public void updateBlockList(String presetName) throws IOException, org.apache.commons.imaging.ImageReadException
      Updates the blocked list display based off of the selected preset
      Parameters:
      presetName - The name of the selected preset
      Throws:
      IOException - If an exception occurred while loading the FXML file
      org.apache.commons.imaging.ImageReadException - If an exception occurred while reading images

    • passwordEnteredPasswordAuth

      public void passwordEnteredPasswordAuth(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Enables the confirm button for parental controls
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - Triggered when a key is pressed in the field

    • onXLabelClickPasswordAuth

      public void onXLabelClickPasswordAuth()
      Handles the XLabelClickPasswordAuth action by hiding the password authentication section and clearing the password section

    • onXLabelClickParentalControls

      public void onXLabelClickParentalControls()
      Handles the XLabelClickParentalControls action by hiding the password authentication section and clearing the password section

    • onEditUserNameButtonClick

      public void onEditUserNameButtonClick()
      Handles the onEditUserNameButtonClick action by checking if the username field is editable, if so it checks the username is not already taken, if the password is taken, it displays an error message and changes the button text to "EDIT" If the username field is not editable, then the text is changed to "SAVE" and the field is set to editable

    • onEditPasswordButtonClick

      public void onEditPasswordButtonClick()
      Handles the onEditPasswordButtonClick action by checking if the password field is editable, if so it checks the password is not blank, then it displays the password authentication pane If the password field is not editable, the password field is cleared, and then set to editable, and the button text is changed to "SAVE"

    • onLogOutButton

      public void onLogOutButton()
      Handles the onLogOutButton action by setting the visibility of the blackout and confirmation panes, through the use of the showPane function

    • onAbortButtonClick

      public void onAbortButtonClick()
      Handles the onAbortButtonClick action by setting the visibility of the blackout and confirmation panes, through the use of the showPane function

    • onConfirmLogOutButtonClick

      public void onConfirmLogOutButtonClick() throws IOException
      Handles the onConfirmLogOutButton action by loading the login-view FXML and the appropriate stylesheet
      Throws:
      IOException - If an exception occurred while loading the FXML file

    • onPasswordAuthenticationCheck

      public void onPasswordAuthenticationCheck()
      Handles the onConfirmParentalControlsButtonClick action by checking if the password entered in correct. If so, the parental controls are disabled, and the status is updated in the database. Otherwise, the user is notified that the password is incorrect.

    • onConfirmParentalControlsButtonClick

      public void onConfirmParentalControlsButtonClick()
      Handles the onConfirmParentalControlsButtonClick action by checking if the password entered in correct. If so, the parental controls are disabled, and the status is updated in the database. Otherwise, the user is notified that the password is incorrect.
